transcript.title: Ian Henderson
transcript.content:
I was saddened to learn of Ian Henderson';s death last night after a recurrence of the illness we had all hoped he might have recovered from some months ago.

He will be remembered as a thoughtful and professional journalist who always sought to achieve balance and objectivity.

In earlier years he served the Australian Labor Party with commitment and dedication. To his parents and Fiona Hamilton I extend my particular sympathy on their sad loss.
